title: The sexual assault page written by Hillary Clinton to remove the phrase "the right to believe "?
subtitle: On the website of the Hillary Clinton campaign, a page on sexual abuse on campus once included a reference to the victim ' s right to be believed, but the wording was deleted in early 2016.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A page on the Hillary Clinton campaign website on sexual assault on campus was edited to delete language on "the victim's right to be believed."
